typeDescriptions.static: Variable value will be read from the value entered below
typeDescriptions.runtime: Variable value will be read from .env file

usage.customComponents: Variables can be used in Custom Tool, Custom Function, Custom Loader, If Else Function with the $ prefix.
usage.textField: Variables can also be used in Text Field parameter of any node. For example, in System Message of Agent:
usage.typeExplanation: If variable type is Static, the value will be retrieved as it is. If variable type is Runtime, the value will be retrieved from .env file.
usage.overrideConfig: You can also override variable values in API overrideConfig using
